body: : The sahuagin's features shift to resemble those of an aquatic elf. It loses its light blindness as well as its claw and bite attacks. The sahuagin gains a +4 enhancement bonus to Dexterity and Charisma, and a +10 circumstance bonus on Disguise checks to appear to be an aquatic elf.
url: pfsrd://Monster Codex/Rules/Sahuagin/New Rules/Sahuagin Spells/Gift of the Deep/Malenti
name: Malenti
